cause.description:
It is our firm belief that thoes exiting the Nintendo detoxification program need loving care and support after the program is over. Even after the 84 steps in the program there are many issues that still plague the recoveree. We are here to help in this long road to recovery
1. Nintendo addicts need help
2. Ted Gibson should become Emperor of the World
3. Kristen Goodin will be his right had man ehr? Woman
cause.mission: To help those just getting out on Nintendo Rehab
cause.name: Nintedno -Anon
